page.title: 14RELIGION KINNERTON,EVENJOBB
page.content: THERE ARE 2 CHURCHES & I CHAPEL. ST.MARY'S CHURCH,KINNERTON BUILT IN 1885 ON THE SITE OF A MEDIEVAL BUILD- ING,IS A CHAPEL OF EASE IN THE PARISH OF OLD RADNOR, IN THE DIOCESE OF HERE- FORD,SERVED BY THE RURAL DEAN OF KING- TON & A CURATE.THE CHURCH'S CENTENARY WAS CELEBRATED ON APRIL 21st,1985 WHEN THE BISHOP OF HEREFORD PLANTED A TREE. AVERAGE ATTENDANCE 2O INCLUDING A SMALL CHOIR.PROVIDES ORGANISTS FOR OLD & NEW RADNOR. ST,PETER'S CHURCH EVANCOYD WAS BUILT 187O.EVENJOBB WAS ORIGINALLY PART OF OLD RADNOR PARISH.IT IS NOW SERVED BY THE RECTOR OF NEW RADNOR & IS IN THE CHURCH IN WALES.AVERAGE ATTENDANCE 15. EVENJOBB BAPTIST CHAPEL,BUILT I849,HAS SERVICES MONTHLY IN THE SUMMER WITH VISITING PREACHERS.AVERAGE ATTENDANCE 6.THE ORGANIST IS FROM KINNERTON.
